portfolio.title: Portfolio Website
portfolio.description: Personal portfolio website with multilingual support (Vietnamese, English, Japanese) and light/dark mode.

cooking-network.title: Cooking Social Network
cooking-network.description: A social platform for cooking enthusiasts to share recipes and interact with each other, featuring real-time messaging and notifications.

hospital.title: Hospital Management System
hospital.description: A hospital management system built with a microservices architecture. It includes a mobile app for patients with an integrated disease diagnosis model and management websites for doctors and staff.

japanese-app.title: Japanese Learning App
japanese-app.description: A Japanese learning app that supports course purchases, provides study resources, and integrates GPT for conversation practice.

tutor.title: Seisei Tutor Website
tutor.description: Tutor website interface with features for course registration, tutor search, and student search.
